name: Blackened
description:
Blackened

A Sokoban-esque puzzle game, made with PuzzleScript for the 8 bits to Infinity's Puzzle jam.

Coding and Design done by me; Graphics and playtesting made by Morning Suks.

Feedback and commentaries are very welcome! Controls
  • Arrow keys - Move;
  • Z - Undo;
  • R - Restart current stage;
  • M - Mute sounds.
Software used
  • Engine: PuzzleScript
  • Graphics: Aseprite
  • SFX: PuzzleScript's built-in BFXR

Finally, a big thank you to every single one of our friends that helped testing this game, and gave their sincere feedback. Thanks a lot guys!
